languages.text: "Каким бы ты ни был при жизни, мне... жаль тебя. Стать дорогой куклой, игрушкой в чужих руках... Никто не заслуживает такой участи".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Каким бы ты ни был при жизни, я... сочувствую тебе. Нет ничего хуже позолоченной клетки и улыбок сквозь стиснутые зубы".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."
languages.original_text: "Каким бы ты ни был при жизни, мне... жаль тебя. Стать дорогой куклой, игрушкой в чужих руках... Никто не заслуживает такой участи".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."
"I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."
"I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

"I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."
"I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, was für eine Person Ihr wart, aber ... Ihr tut mir leid. Reduziert auf eine teure Puppe, ein Spielzeug in jemand anderes Händen ... So ein Schicksal verdient niemand."
languages.original_text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, was für eine Person Ihr wart, aber ... Ihr tut mir leid. Reduziert auf eine teure Puppe, ein Spielzeug in jemand anderes Händen ... So ein Schicksal verdient niemand."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas quel genre de personne vous étiez, mais... je suis désolée pour vous. Devenir une simple marionnette, se faire manipuler par autrui... Personne ne mérite un tel sort. »
languages.original_text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas quel genre de personne vous étiez, mais... je suis désolée pour vous. Devenir une simple marionnette, se faire manipuler par autrui... Personne ne mérite un tel sort. »

languages.text: “我不知道你生前是什么样的人，但……我为你感到难过。沦落为昂贵的玩具，任由他人摆布……没人应该遭受这样的命运。”
languages.original_text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道你生前是什么样的人，但……我为你感到难过。沦落为昂贵的玩具，任由他人摆布……没人应该遭受这样的命运。”

languages.text: «No sé qué clase de persona era, pero... siento lástima por usted. Convertirse en un juguete caro al servicio de otros... Nadie merece un destino así».
languages.original_text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: «No sé qué clase de persona era, pero... siento lástima por usted. Convertirse en un juguete caro al servicio de otros... Nadie merece un destino así».

languages.text: 「あなたがどのような方だったのかは存じませんが…あたくしはあなたをお気の毒に思います。高価な人形、誰かの手の中で遊ばれるおもちゃにされてしまうなんて…そのような運命にふさわしい人など誰もいません」
languages.original_text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたがどのような方だったのかは存じませんが…あたくしはあなたをお気の毒に思います。高価な人形、誰かの手の中で遊ばれるおもちゃにされてしまうなんて…そのような運命にふさわしい人など誰もいません」

languages.text: "Ne tür bir insan olduğunu bilmiyorum ama... Sana acıyorum. Pahalı bir bebeğe, birinin elinde bir oyuncağa dönüşmek... Hiç kimse böyle bir kaderi hak etmez."
languages.original_text: "I do not know what kind of person you were, but... I feel sorry for you. To be reduced to an expensive doll, a toy in someone's hands... No one deserves such a fate."

traits.locale_text: "Ne tür bir insan olduğunu bilmiyorum ama... Sana acıyorum. Pahalı bir bebeğe, birinin elinde bir oyuncağa dönüşmek... Hiç kimse böyle bir kaderi hak etmez."
